description:
Back in their childhood, Zororo gets a copy robot as a gift from his parents.  Naturally, Keroro decides to abuse it.  Returning to the present, a fire scare at the base prompts Keroro to take a fire safety class.  But he gets sold the wrong textbooks, and gets the runaround when he tries to return them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, The Forbidden Game / Keroro, Frightening Invaders
ちびケロ 禁じられた遊び / ケロロ 恐怖の侵略者
